heroText: Help to build an open repository of data to digitally enrich your language
ttsSloganText: Enrich your language by typing the audio that you hear
ttsContributionSubtext: Contribute by typing what you hear on audio
ttsValidationSubtext: Validate the texts transcribed by others
asrSloganText: Enrich your language by donating your voice
asrContributionSubtext: Contribute your voice by recording the sentence
asrValidationSubtext: Validate the audios recorded by others
translationSloganText: Enrich your language by translating text
translationContributionSubtext: Contribute by translating the prompted text in your language
translationValidationSubtext: Validate the translations contributed by others
ocrSloganText: Enrich your language by typing the text you see
ocrValidationSubtext: Validate the images labelled by others

bronzeContributeFive: Contribute just 5 sentences in your language

opinionQuestionText: What is your opinion of this page

changeUserModalSubHeading: All the fields are optional but you can enrich your dataset contribution by providing the demographic details.
name: Name
userNameError: Please don't use only numerics or email as username

socialSharingTextWithoutRank: I've contributed towards building open language repository for India on {{url}}. Let's make a difference by contributing to Crowdsourcing and empower our languages.
socialSharingTextWithRank: I've contributed towards building open language repository for India on {{url}}. {{language}} ranks {{rank}} on {{initiativeName}}. Let's make a difference by contributing to Crowdsourcing and empower our languages.
validateWarningMsg: Only contributions invited for the selected language
contributeWarningMsg: Please make your own language AI models better by validating data
ocrContributionTagline: Type the text as per the image
selectContributionLanguagePrompt2: Select the language pair for contribution
metaDescription: Crowdsourcing: An initiative for Indian languages that will be as Indian, as you and I. We invite you to contribute data to develop Speech Recognition, Text-to-Speech, Machine Translation and Optical Character Recognition for Indian languages.
metaOGTitle: Crowdsourcing : An initiative for Indian languages
contributionTrackerSubHeader1: Your language and top 3 contributed languages
contributionTrackerSubHeader2: Your language pair and top 3 contributed language pairs
label: Label

hurtingStatement: Hurting sentiments of religion, community or abusive content etc.

multipleRequestApiError: We are processing multiple requests at the moment. Please try again after sometime.
validationWarningText: We feel the text you entered doesn't match the original text, are you sure about your edit?
tipFour: Read once before recording it. Do not record punctuations like comma, fullstop.
